website_summaries.verdict: The Monster DNA Pro headphones are a step forward in design and sound quality, but some users may find the earcups too narrow.
pros: The Monster DNA Pro 2.0 Over-Ear headphones are well-balanced and good-quality with two headphone ports for simultaneous listening
They come with a soft carrying case and two cables (one for extra length and another with an inline mic/remote for smartphone use)
cons: Listeners with large ears will have a hard time finding a comfortable position for these headphones

customer_reviews.title: Fake headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two sets of DNA headphones from Best Buy and they are by far the best headphones ever but the pair I bought from Amazon where fake WTF.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a teenager and girls, sounds as good as the beats! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, first of all people are saying no instructions, yes it does, u have to look harder, in box on the sleeve that bends, back side, slips out, about 5 X 8 instructions, use a magnifier cause super small print, but do u really need them? U plug into the side with the volume call cord and put in ur iPad or iPod or iPhone or whatever and u listen simple as that, the other cord is for sharing only if u want to sync music or share.
customer_reviews.author: ALBY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound, poor quality.....
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very good. Music sounds wonderfully crystal clear through these headphones. However, after only a few months, the vinyl covering the earpads came apart at the seam, revealing the foam inside. (This occurred with normal use - 3/4 days a week, 1/2 hrs at a time.) Even though I reinforced/sewed it back together, at LEAST 12 times over a 9 month period, the vinyl kept separating. For the price that I paid, and the brand, I was both shocked and disappointed by this. To this day, I use them when my wireless ones are charging. And though they are covered in tape, somehow, the sound is still excellent! Go figure.... 😊
customer_reviews.author: YaLanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: My husband and son both have these headphones and love them. Great sound quality and are holding up very well for my son who doesn't always take the best care of them. My kids love the extra output on them so that they can link two sets of headphones together to listen to the same music. They used to have to sit really close and only get one earbud from the set and they love being able to have their own set of good headphones while they listen to the same song. Would definitely buy again if we need another set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: jenni

customer_reviews.title: Beats vs Monster
customer_reviews.text: I just got these in. I initially bought "like new" Beats Solo. It may have been a defected product but my left side earphone didn't seem loud enough. I troubleshooted and no fix. Returned them and after hearing from a friend about these I thought to give these a chance. I bought these refurbished which was cheaper than what I paid for the Beats Solo. I'm not a professional when it comes to reviews but these instantly won my vote! The sound is just what I was looking for. Able to adapt to different genres. The bass when needed the acoustic when needed. Light weight. Made phones calls no problems. I'm happy with the purchase and met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best headphones ever
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with my DNA headphones. I'm a weight lifter and as a female I want no one to "offer a spot" or try to talk to me. These have been so much help. Due to the obvious manner of wearing them people won't put you through the hassle of removing them to talk and if they try to while you're listening to music, they will look like an idiot because they cancel out all noise, have AMAZING sound quality and when listening to trap, dubstep, or hip hop is such a blast! The bass is PERFECTION. Do yourself a favor and splurge for a set of headphones that work so amazingly!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Pauley

customer_reviews.title: Great, but try them out in a store for a bit if you wear glasses
customer_reviews.text: All things considered these headphones are fantastic. I bought them on sale (black Friday week) at a 65% or so discount. The sound is amazing compared to anything I found in the price range. Particularly because they are noise canceling. Considering I paid under 80 dollars for a two hundred dollar set of headphones, I'd say it's awesome. Having said that, these become painful on the ears if you wear glasses... really painful after 3-4 hours, hence the 4 stars. If you're wondering I wear thin frames. Otherwise great headphones look great even with a dress coat.
customer_reviews.author: Vadim

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as Beats by Dre, but cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones! The sound quality and bass is better than the Bose Noise Quiet Comfort headphones that I own. The noise cancelling ability on them are also as good. Pros: Great bass, great audio quality, folds up for easy storage, and allows you to hook up another headphone to it so 2 of you can enjoy the music Con: I prefer "over the ear" style headphones, so these do cause some discomfort on the ears after wearing them for awhile. Key word "some." Overall: I would buy these before buying the Bose Quiet Comforts. Great headphones.
customer_reviews.author: C James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: I own both the Beats and Bose Noise Cancelling Headphones. These were for my children who love them and say that they are as good as my headphones. However, the price was far less than what I paid for mine $350.00+). Would I trade? No way! Bose and Beats are still superior, but these are great for the kids at a fraction of the price. (Got them for $80 on Black Friday) They have some nice perks like being able to switch the cord to either ear, and are compatible with the "i" products (Apple). You can control the sound and pause from the cord if you're connected to an iPad, iPod, or iPhone. The kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Don Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Got ripped off
customer_reviews.text: Did not even work for a year and a Monster refused to honor the warranty because they were not bought from an “authorized” dealer
customer_reviews.author: Poppy5555

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for hard to please teenager
customer_reviews.text: gave these as a gift to a nephew who is hard to please when it comes to gifts. He immediately put them on and has not taken them off. Better than that, the noise isolation definately works and sound is very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Houston

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Gets loud like the way to fold them in case. Def Worth price. Got the Blue one.. very nice. Only thing with material on ears like all rest , gotta clean them. Fits good on small ears and head. If use while working out with sweating hi have some diff sliding off
customer_reviews.author: melriv

customer_reviews.title: Monster DNA Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have just got this headphone and its simply amazing. I have had many many headphones and these are top notch. In fact I cannot fault them. They have an amazing sound deep bass clear mids and soft highs. They work great on my MP3 and my disc man. I am fanatical about great sound and i knew these would not let me down. Don't hesitate just buy them you will not regret it. Oh yes you will always get the moaners about everything they buy including these great headphones, ignore and order them
customer_reviews.author: Garry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones
customer_reviews.text: Really really really bomb headphones. I never have had better headphones. The bass is nice, without compromising the highs and mids. One thing to be careful about is ripping the foam ear cups. Just take care of these headphones and they will not disappoint you. I use them primarily for gaming and it makes the in game audio much better. The dual audio jack is by far one of my favorite features of these headphones. It enables me to watch netflix with a friend through a phone/tablet without disturbing others around us. Great headphones, although that price is a bit steep.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not as  picture advertised
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality it great, but you get what you pay for. A few years ago I had a pair and ended up losing them. Purchased these with excitement but they weren't what I thought I'd get. The headphones have the chord glued in on the left side so you can't switch the chords. They are also not bluetooth like the originals. The sound quality is great dont get me wrong, but it just isnt what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Leeeeeaaaaah

customer_reviews.title: Ear pads falling off and they hurt my ears.
customer_reviews.text: The ear pads fell off. Again. The exact thing happened the first time I bought these, within the first few months :(. So they replaced them. But guess what? Same problem after a year. They hurt my ears too and I have a really small head. Both of these design problems are mentioned in several other reviews. Everything else is great, so it's really too bad they can't fix these problems. Also other reviews mention a connected cable - mine aren't like that. Beware of fake products ones. Mine came in a normal looking branded box just as described.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customers support
customer_reviews.text: These are good sounding headphones however when the package arrived there was a tear on the padding on the left ear,a day later or so the tear started separating from headphones, I contacted monster support on MonsterProducts.com and got nothing but an automated email so I would not buy these headphones because of the absolutely horrible customer support, it's not worth hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Ear pads ripped apart. The cable caused my iPod ...
customer_reviews.text: Ear pads ripped apart. The cable caused my iPod to glitch out constantly making it pause and/or skips songs. When I contacted Monster they told me more or less told me that's unfortunate that my iPod was broken and that the cable would never cause that issue. I was a big supporter of Monster products until this. Now I will never spend another dollar on them.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Kimmell

customer_reviews.title: Think it twice, for good. (Monster site 49.00)
customer_reviews.text: Tbh in the Monster website they're 49 dollars. i'm not sure if they aren't original. I saw reviews on youtube and the box is not a slide-into-an-outerbox design. it came with two cables, one with volume and play controls. The quality seems medium, but as well as on YT review, it is a mid to low external quality item. The bass is just okay, and the clarity is good. Overall you pay 50% more, and get the concern if you have an original item or not.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Vanegas

customer_reviews.title: Great phones great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great phones great sound. A bit bass oriented but an adjustment on the mp3 equalizer and they sounded fine. Originally played beach boys Barbara Ann and the bass drowned out everything bur adjusted EQ and it sounds real nice. A bit frustrating as each recording is mixed and mastered differently but a somewhat neutral EQ can still be achieved tho some will be bassier than others.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Lee Kong

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for friend's dad.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my best friend's father-in-law. He is a very kind old gentleman that treated me as his own family. He enjoys music, love singing, he was thrilled when he opened it up. I believe his wife was also equally pleased, because the loud music won't leak out again..
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Band inside breaks and there's no stores to fix these ...
customer_reviews.text: Band inside breaks and there's no stores to fix these headphones.. I even called Monster Inc.. Basically they want to pay for new headphones every time your headphones break or buy a warranty which doesn't come with headphones sold from AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Lani M

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Headphones did not Stay Together even though Handled Gently
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the sound in these, they worked great for a while until one side of the headphone where you'd adjust popped out from the sliding track. These are mostly comfortable, but can't be worn for too long before they began to hurt the ears. These were cared for very gently, kept in the box when not in use and never left home with them.
customer_reviews.author: KaLan J

customer_reviews.title: these headphones are amazing. The sound quality is very good and almost ...
customer_reviews.text: Given their price, these headphones are amazing. The sound quality is very good and almost all of the noise gets blocked out. They fold perfectly so they fit easier in a purse or backpack and this way they do not brea or get damaged. They come with two separate wires; a regular one and one with a microphone. I have not even used the one with a microphone since the regular wire has been holding extremely well and I have had it for over 3 months now. I highly recommend these headphones, especially for their price its a must.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Pretty ordinary sound wise . Advertised for comfort for extended listening is not accurate. These hurt my ears after just 45 minutes to an hour. Not sure what they are calling extended listening. Sound isn't bad but I am going to look for more comfortable headphones for extended listening.
customer_reviews.author: sleddogs

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 AMAZING HEADPHONES
customer_reviews.text: I have not had the same (bad) experience as some others. THESE ARE AMAZING! I have had two of these and all I can say Is they are amazing. The bass is decent. Clarity is great. The cushioning is very very comfortable. I have a wireless Bluetooth receiver I use with it so I don't need wires. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Yuvi Makkar

customer_reviews.title: GOOD but Pricey. (Better Options)
customer_reviews.text: Good Head Phones Great Sound. Thanks Amazon for the good deal. HOWEVER, there are Cheaper Headphones that have the same sound. I would consider a different brand,
customer_reviews.author: MovieGuy

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: I love using these things. I had smile on my face for 30 minutes straight the first time I used these headphones. In general, the biggest problem for me when using noise cancelling headphones is that they put so much pressure on the ears that it feels like torture. This is not an issue at all with this product--it is extremely comfortable and produces superb sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, but falling apart and no cooperation
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones in March. They sound great, but a couple of months later after light usage they are coming apart where the headband bow slides into the head band cushion. I contacted the seller 19th Hole and Monster directly. Both told me to call the other. If they were not coming apart or would have received any cooperation I would have rated them very high. I will not purchase Monster products or deal with 19th Hole ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Forseth

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved them, so I went ahead and ordered some ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially, these were a gift for my sister (she was given a baby blue pair) and upon trying them, I absolutely loved them, so I went ahead and ordered some for myself (these pink pair). They're awesome and sound proof. I use them while studying, running/working out, and so on. I've just ordered black ones for my other sister as a gift for Christmas. I highly recommend them. The only thing that I would change about these is giving the ability for it to be cordless. Besides this, they're fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY THESE NOW :D
customer_reviews.text: I was really hesitant on buying these. There's headphones go for 200-230$ and I didn't think they'd be the real deal, but I was wrong! They are the real deal. And by the beard of Zeus they are amazing! Sound quality is amazing! Hard hitting bass and good highs and lows and treble blah blah blah. They're perfect and I'm a music obsessed freak. I go through a couple pairs of headphones in 6 months. These bastards are perfect. Great quality sound, built to last, stylish, comfortable. A great deal for the price. Love these things. Oh and very comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Barnes

customer_reviews.title: WON'T LAST!! DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Very upset They only lasted a few months. The fabric around the ear phone began to peel away & then one side quit working all together!! It all happened within months, too long for any kind of warranty!! Wouldn't buy these again.. stick with beats!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl blackburn

customer_reviews.title: If you're on the fence, BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headphones. My Beats Solo's broke in one ear, and since I've had them for a few years anyway, figured it was time for a replacement. After scouring the internet, watching video reviews and comparing products, I decided to give these headphones a shot. I like a lot of bass, and these certainly deliver a punch. That being said, if you do not want rib-cage shattering bass, you can also hear real clarity in studio-quality music. Overall, I'm impressed for the price point. TL;DR: no ragrats
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Broke right away
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality good, but plastic pieces where headphones slide to extend broke within a couple weeks. And both sides broke almost in the same place so I'm thinking the design is a flaw if neither side can withstand extending and compacting over a two week period. Seems like I must have paid about $20 a for them like I would pay for a pair for a 5 year old. Very disappointed as these were a Christmas present for my 15 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Style and quality. Could cost less.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is better than the monster beats solo and costs less. You pay for quality, not by brand. That is smart shopping. Requires no amplifier. Of course there are better headphones (I have an audio technica ath m-50 wich is better), but it is beautiful (what my wife wanted) without the absurd expense that Beats cost. Did that Monster fabricate and sell replacement pads. A beautiful and good product.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Peniche Santos

customer_reviews.title: Speaker blew within three weeks of use. Great sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've used these headphones for about 3 weeks now. Within that time, the left speaker already blew with light listening on medium volume 3-4 times per week. The sounds quality is great, especially for the the price of the headphones. The structure is fairly durable, but .they are a bit tight around my ears. I'm definitely disappointed in the fact that the speaker blew so quickly given the fact that I do not listen to music very loudly.
customer_reviews.author: Sajad Hosseini

customer_reviews.title: They brake very easily... I would go with Sennheiser
customer_reviews.text: Cushion ripped apart after less than a year of very moderate use. I still have some Sennheiser I received as a present like 3 or more years ago and they're still great. So my next ones will also be Sennheiser... good luck if you get these DNAs. 5 stars for the looks.. 4 stars for the sound, it is good.. 2 stars everything else.. they broke, can get uncomfortable quickly and also forget about going running with them.. they'll get super sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Sound wore out fast and the cover over the cushions ripped fast as well. Just burst open one day :/ I only had them for about 6 months. They were great, around the third is when I started to notice the sound wearing out. If they werent so expensive I wouldnt have minded. They fit great, and were easy to fold up and put away though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son likes them
customer_reviews.text: They went on sale before Christmas and I bought these for my son and he really likes them. I did not purchase them for some fashion statement but rather so that he could use them for his ipad and TV when I don't want to hear all the noise. I have to admit I use them to listen to my audio books and the sound is really great through them and they are really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mo-z

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best sounding headphone in this price range. Much better them mine beats solo. It has great clarity with highs and midst with strong bass. I have bought this item in 5 different colors for my kids and family members for the holidays. This color is hot pink not orange like in the pictures provided.
customer_reviews.author: Robb

customer_reviews.title: Got my Monster DNA On-Ear Headphones today
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The look is awesome. I wouldn't necessarily say the sound is better than Beats Solo but it definitely is comparable. Packaging I give it an 8. Cons: They don't feel as durable as Beats Solo. They actually feel like any other headphones. I'm not too confident they'd hold up if I drop them. I wish/prefer if they carrying case was zippered and not drawstring.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: High quality product-great product!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter and she loves them-Sound quality is crisp and clear. Loves that they fold up for travel and storage. Very comfortable to wear. My son is jealous since he says they are better sound quality than the Sol's we bought for him a year ago. High quality product-worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: S. M. G.

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY COLOR, COOL SHAPE, SOUND LACKING
customer_reviews.text: I found these to be really cool headphones but the sound quality wasn't good for me I highly recommend them for teenagers, they are really cool but when it comes to genuine music listening they lack. Unless you are an audio phile, you might not notice the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Lady B.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HEADPHONES LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound and good base, when you adjust your equalizer on your phone to what you want. People who show the chord not being flat or things being broken on these are just haters. I own a pair and bought another as a gift for someone. In my opinion I like them better than beats because these have a more balanced sound to them. They come in a box with a regular chord and a chord with a mic for your phone and also come with a carry pouch to put them in. Love these headphones and will stick with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Order these for my husband because he is always borrowing mine. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are amazing; everything about them
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing; everything about them. I owned a pair Beats Solo previously and they were pretty good, but after awhile they started to break and the bass started to go. So I started to look around and found these. I was amazed, the way they looked was great so I went out and tested them. They were everything I hoped for and more, the sound Is outstanding it feels and sounds like you are at a live concert. They are great from style, to sound, and easy to transport thanks to the unique way that they fold up. Once you get these you will never go back to beats, these overpower beats by every mean. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Also they are not comfortable for extended wear
customer_reviews.text: A noticeable quality output though a little base heavy -- prefer a more neutral output. The build quality is questionable on the head band, my padding came away from the outer band. There is no way to replace the ear pads either. Also they are not comfortable for extended wear.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Great pretty rugged
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones I have had them for almost 5 years now and they have held up strong until just lately the plastic is cracking and the sound is starting to fade in the right ear
customer_reviews.author: Mdok

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, but not the most durable or comfortable
customer_reviews.text: On my second day using it, the fabric of the ear cushions tore off- without me having applied any pressure or pull to it! Not a deal breaker, but annoying because they were the first expensive headphones I bought. Other than that, it's pretty good at noise cancelling, but after an hour or so my ears start to hurt because they get slightly pinched by the cushions- maybe I just have larger-than-average ears?
customer_reviews.author: lopz301

customer_reviews.title: I don't think I've been overusing or mistreating them but with my current pair and previous the connection between the two speak
customer_reviews.text: This product lost a star because of one big problem. I don't think I've been overusing or mistreating them but with my current pair and previous the connection between the two speakers was lost which really sucks. other than that the headphone are amazing in sound quality
customer_reviews.author: M. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to purchase especially on sale!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered fast & earlier. I bought them for my daughter who is a musician. She loves, uses them just about every single day & thinks they are the best headphones ever. I got a pair of HD's for my birthday & they are nothing less than amazing. My son has the studio version & uses them daily like they attached to his head. He owns a set of Beats & rarely uses them. I own several monster product from cables to connections & now headphones. Everything has out performed & outlasted every simular product. Buy anything monster & you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DABjr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Nice headphones. Great sound. Exactly what I was looking for. Pink is amazingly beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: ATenn

customer_reviews.title: Monster Sound Delivered.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones deliver awesome sound at a really great price. I already had one pair and bought this pair for my son. I highly recommend Monster DNA Headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Lowe

customer_reviews.title: the BEST Headphones within the Monster range
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps, the BEST Headphones within the Monster range. Extremely good results with all types of music including Classic. They also collapse and are great for travelling. Nice unique Design also...
customer_reviews.author: HIGHFLYER

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound. Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: I had heard of the Monster brand of headphones, but never really bothered with them until I saw on sale. I had been looking to replace my old headphones. Definitely reduces outside noise, but there are times when some of the outside noise can sneak in, this could be due to me having a larger head. Sound is great. I use it on my iPad with the mic/volume control cable. Music and movies sound crisp and clear and also works great with my Playstation 4. Definitely check these out if you are in the market for new headphones
customer_reviews.author: DorianCA

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. Not only do they provide a great sound with quality base, they are extremely comfy. I used these on a seven hour trip to Florida and i never felt any discomfort. The whole trip the headphones sounded great and never altered even though i have had them for over a year. If your looking for comfortable, great sounding, and great base headphones I recomend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a great headphone for walking out,very balanced,I can enjoy all kinds of music
customer_reviews.author: Yi Xiaosheng

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and bass quality but after an hour the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound and bass quality but after an hour the headphones begin to put too much pressure on your ears.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: These are the best headphones. Wow the quality isn't as good as ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones. Wow the quality isn't as good as some of the more expensive headphones out there, they're comfortable and easy to walk around the city in. I find that the ones that have more noise canceling drowned out the noise of the city and can be very dangerous when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Jaybee

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I just got these today, but I love the excellent sound quality. They actually sound better than my son's $200 Beats.
customer_reviews.author: rascal19

customer_reviews.title: Make these wireless please!
customer_reviews.text: So let me start off by saying these headphones are high quality and deliver good sound. They are made by a good company and have a very nice design. They are comfortable and have overall a high amount of positive things about them. The one thing that is very annoying about these headphones is how long the cord is that plugs into your device and the headphones. It will get caught on pretty much everything. If these were wireless or had a cord that was not like 3 feet long they would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I'm an audiofile. I've tried a lot of headphones, and these were the best I could find for the money (I purchased referbished). I had to return a pair of audio-technicas (bass-heavy) because they just sounded terrible. These headphones are comfortable, and really, really do sound amazing. It's not just a 'style' marketing thing, they actually work really well relative to the headphones in this price category. I used to own a pair of bose ($150), and these headphones have a better overall listening experience (I love deephouse, electro). My .02.
customer_reviews.author: David Wisner

customer_reviews.title: Unbelieveable quality at an unbelieveable price......
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding headphones for the price, have purchased sennheisers in the past for much more, and the sound quality of the DNA's are superior to me, I found their quality far superior to the Beats also, sound, and style. I also like how compact they are when they are folded up. Only downside I can see with these headphones are that they could provide a longer cording for the headphones, and a hard case to store them in, much like the. Deisel VEKTR comes with
customer_reviews.author: nicholas fazio

customer_reviews.title: Buy extra ear pads
customer_reviews.text: Love the bass on these headphones and great Noise isolation. Rating only 3 stars because of poor durability. This is my second pair of Monster DNAs and Ive had a problem with ear pad tears on both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Gid

customer_reviews.title: These are the best headphones ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones ever. The quality is great along with the sound quality. I use them all the time and I love how they got my head and feel on my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Barker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME HEADPHONES!!! MY GRANDSON SAYS THEY ARE AMAZING AND THE SOUND IS EXCEPTIONAL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: If you don't care what people think of you buy these. If you want image wear beats.
customer_reviews.text: better than beats in 2 of my kids opinion. The only kids who likes beats over dna is my daughter who is all caught up into image over quality.
customer_reviews.author: farleyfive

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I wear them for at least 2 hours everyday doing warehouse work and they have held up great. And I have not been gentle with them at all.
customer_reviews.author: lynzie h

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones - better than beats
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have amazing sound. They hit the lows, highs ,and the kids unlike beats by dr dre are mostly lows. With me being a audiophile and having professional sound equipment and previously owning beats solo hd's, these headphones blow them out of the park. Definite buy if you like to hear music how it was made to be
customer_reviews.author: DJ Robotica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. The package had obvious wear but the product appears brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones. Sound is equal to similar headphones made ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones. Sound is equal to similar headphones made by Beats. Comparing to other similar headphones the Monster DNA's sound better, have a great range of highs & lows. I recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Better than Beats by far
customer_reviews.text: DNA Headphones are well balanced and clear. They are one of the clearest set of cans that I have ever tried. Beats, Skullcandy, and the like (designer headphones) are all comically unbalanced with overpowering lows and muddy highs. These DNA are great at reproducing the quality of studio headphones while looking great. The highs are nice and clear without being piercing and the lows are punchy but not too aggressive and the mids complement everything else nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R.

customer_reviews.title: its still working but the head bad plastic is so brittle and cheap and at the ...
customer_reviews.text: its still working but the head bad plastic is so brittle and cheap and at the slightest thing it breaks. Just buy a tube of super glue with it. The sound quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these for use in Afghanistan back in 2013 they have been my go to headphones ever since. They just recently started to have the ear pads tear at the seem but after 4 years and 7 countries with moderate to excessive use I'd recommend this to anyone who takes care of their stuff and wants something that'll last in even the worst conditions.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Big  hit  for  Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these on a daily deal for my 14 year old son as a gift for Christmas. He loved them, Likes the sound, the feel, and of course the look. I feel like I got a Great deal at 75.00 and The gift was appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: NDMOM

customer_reviews.title: Love them! These are my second pair after losing ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them! These are my second pair after losing my first. I took star off because the cable with the speaker malfunctioned and it raises the volume on its own. I just use the other cable now and it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the headphones, color, and unique style. But the I had to return it because the ear cushions would not stay together and kept falling apart. I'll keep trying to find the perfect headphones set.
customer_reviews.author: Perla J. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price, ear buds are cheaply mad!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for Easter, less than 2 months ago. The padding on the ears have come lose and make them look bad. I sent an email asking for a replacement with no response. These are not worth the price paid. Very disappointing product and even worse customer service.
customer_reviews.author: J. Busch

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair for 2 years and they got smooshed when i moved. repurchasing because i love the sound (comparable to beats) and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality headphones. Isolates pretty well and stays snug on my head even while working out or running.
customer_reviews.author: Daryn

customer_reviews.title: Great, but be aware
customer_reviews.text: Great headphone in terms of performance, however the rubber on the ear cover is now tearing. I can't imagine why as i only use these at work and im not abusive taking care of it. Had it since early july. Will be contacting monster see if I have warranty coverage.

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Just received these headphones and tried them out to make sure everything checked out. So far I am very happy with my purchase, usually I don't like to spend a lot of money on headphones but I couldn't be happier with these. I love the design, sound, the color. I will update this after my first six months of having these but if I don't have any problems with them, these will be my go to for getting any kind of replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Leyva

customer_reviews.title: over all good headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these headphones they are very clear sounding and comfortable my only problem with these headphone is that they don't carry that much base and wierd colored marks show up on the headphones after multiple hours of use but I love these headphones either way over all good buy
customer_reviews.author: JennD

customer_reviews.title: He says they're especially useful at school when he's working on audio computer assignments ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my 15 year old son and he likes them. He says they're especially useful at school when he's working on audio computer assignments because he can block out the distractions from other computers; and the clarity is good. I would recommend purchasing extra cables because those wear out easy when worn/used much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!!! Great Look!!!
customer_reviews.text: These headphone are stylish and have a great sound. I would recommend them to anyone. Their price is similar to that of competitors, but they have such a unique look to them that their is no mistaking the DNA's from all the rest that seem to all have the same style and shape, just different logos on them. I also love the sound quality. I own a pair of Beats and they are great for bass heads (which I can be depending on my mood), but with the DNA's, every instrument/vocal/sound comes thru equally crystal clear. DNA's are great! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Leah H.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones. The sound is nice and clear. I have a pair of Diesel Vektr headphones along with a pair of Beats Studio headphones, and honestly, I prefer these over the other two (not saying that the Diesel Vektr or Beats Studios headphones aren't good). All in all, these are great headphones for the price that they go for
customer_reviews.author: Michael Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound with a comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Headphones came earlier than expected, in plenty of time to be wrapped and put under the tree for Christmas. Since I'm the lone female in a house of men, most of whom are teenagers who constantly misplace their own stuff, the pink on black headphones kelps my manly-men away from them! Great sound with a comfortable fit. Love them, and they're MINE!
customer_reviews.author: humming

customer_reviews.title: Display model not whole shabang
customer_reviews.text: I ended up with a display model. (fixed cable in left jack and no accessories). I've always loved these headphones but I question this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are AWESOME. The sound is great. I use them with my Iphone. I bought pink so my teenager wouldn't steal them like he has my others. I usually only use Boise products. These are working out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: erwin w. arguilla

customer_reviews.title: I hightly reccomend these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones for my girlfriend. After using them for a short while, myself, i am now really considering buying myself some as well. The volume can go up a lot louder than i expected at the same time as it blocks out outside noises. The bass is incredible and can also go up really high withought overpowering the rest of the sound. Also, they are a nice snug fit which allows you to run with them and withought needing to re-adjust them every 10 sec. I highly reccomend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Accurate frequency response, crystal clear. Love 'em
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice headphones. They are not "bass heavy" so if you want the harder thump, these are not it. Rather, they provide a true sound level across all hearable frequencies. I was blown away by how clear they sounded. I have experience as a pro sound engineer. These rival some of the best studio phones I ever used. I know some people say the bass is poor. Personally, I might prefer just slightly more bass for listening to my mp3 player, but the sound produced by these is so clear that I can hear things in the music that I do not hear over the car stereo when playing the same songs.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, good looks.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great headset. It limits the external noise a bit and the sound quality it great. Plus it looks cool and you can attach another headset to it so 2 people can listen at once. That's great for kids watching a DVD player.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my teenage son. He loves the sound and the sturdiness of the headphones. He says they are sturdier than the Beats by Dre. The Beats by Dre have a bunch of bass but the DNA headphones have a clear sound.
customer_reviews.author: Monik

customer_reviews.title: I believe it's a demo version and that it's not fake because the sound quality is pretty good, especially the bass
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy them for $49.99 On sale. They sent me a plain box with the monster logo on it with the headphones and that's it. The cable is fixed so it's not removable. I believe it's a demo version and that it's not fake because the sound quality is pretty good, especially the bass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clear Sound/Noise Cancellation
customer_reviews.text: Great for travel. The storage satchel can be attached to any carry on bag or purse. Great sound!
customer_reviews.author: Giola Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Sound was pretty good but a bit too "bassy" for my tastes. However, the reason I sent them back was because the band on the left and right sides started to crack.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lott

customer_reviews.title: These are by far the best headphones I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best headphones I've ever owned. On thing I will say about these are the blue isn't as vibrant as in the photos but its no big deal. They're still really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nyko

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift for my husband's birthday. He is very strict about sound stuff and he loved this one. The sound is so clear. I do recommend this one based on my husband's experience.
customer_reviews.author: Anabueno

customer_reviews.title: I bought them 2 years ago and they are still working like a charm
customer_reviews.text: These are really high quality headphones. I bought them 2 years ago and they are still working like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the AMAZON PRICE. If its on original price...? 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: HML

product_meta.title: Monster DNA On-Ear Headphones, White Tuxedo
product_meta.description: Color:Tuxedo White| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingJam out to your favorite tunes with the Monster DNA On-Ear Headphones. These headphones are lightweight and comfortable for an improved listening experience. They are also easy to clean and maintain to ensure optimal usability. With a tangle-free, Control Talk Apple cable, these white tuxedo headphones are easy to connect and use. Listen to crystal-clear audio from your device with these on-ear headphones at home or on the go.
feature_bullets: Advanced noise-isolating design reduces ambient sound
Ear cushions for comfort during extended listening sessions
Dual audio input jacks let you link your MusicShare headphones together and share the audio
Durable yet ultra light materials withstand travel and continuous use
Customize your look with a variety of skins (sold separately)

specifications.Item model number: MH DNA ON WHB CA WW
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,106 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
